svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Military expenditure per capita, constant 2015 US$
Military expenditure per capita is calculated by dividing military expenditure by the country's total population.
